## Upset Plot {#upset-plot}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| out.width: "100%"
#| fig.align: "center"
library(here)

knitr::opts_knit$set(upload.fun = knitr::image_uri)

up <- here::here("figures", "upset_plot.png")
stopifnot(file.exists(up))
knitr::include_graphics(up)

```
